function.name: submission_eval
function.description: This function is used to evaluate the below submission to the consultation. This submission is from a civil society organisation or academic. Each parameter property is a question that you must respond to after carefully reading the description.

objectives.description: What does the submitter think about the objectives of the bill and its overall approach? Please provide a brief summary, and the reasoning behind the submitter's belief. If the submitter makes no comment on this aspect, return 'No comment'.

existing_codes.description: What does the submitter think of the existing industry code? Please provide a brief summary, and the reasoning behind the submitter's belief. If the submitter makes no comment on this aspect, return 'No comment'.

code_support.description: Does the submitter support the use of codes of practice under this bill or does it consider government regulation should be used? Please provide a brief summary, and the reasoning behind the submitter's belief. If the submitter makes no comment on this aspect, return 'No comment'.

freedom_of_speech.description: What effect does the submitter believe the bill would have on freedom of speech? Please provide a brief summary, and the reasoning behind the submitter's belief. If the submitter makes no comment on this aspect, return 'No comment'.

protecting_freedom_of_speech.description: Does the submitter suggest ways in which freedom of speech could be better protected? Please provide a brief summary, and the reasoning behind the submitter's belief. If the submitter makes no comment on this aspect, return 'No comment'.

excluded_services.description: Does the submitter make any comments on whether there should be additional or fewer services included in the set of excluded services? Please provide a brief summary, and the reasoning behind the submitter's belief. If the submitter makes no comment on this aspect, return 'No comment'.

exclusion_of_government.description: Does the submitter provide a view on the exclusion for government information? Please provide a brief summary, and the reasoning behind the submitter's belief. If the submitter makes no comment on this aspect, return 'No comment'.

ACMA_powers.description: Does the submitter provide a view on the information gathering powers given to ACMA? Please provide a brief summary, and the reasoning behind the submitter's belief. If the submitter makes no comment on this aspect, return 'No comment'.

ACMA_access.description: Does the submission comment on what access should the ACMA have to digital platform data? Please provide a brief summary, and the reasoning behind the submitter's belief. If the submitter makes no comment on this aspect, return 'No comment'.
